required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Postnatal Managemant of Prenetal Cardiac Echogenic Foci in Hillel Yaffe Medical Center
clinical_study.official_title: Postnatal Managemant of Prenetal Cardiac Echogenic Foci in Hillel Yaffe

brief_summary.textblock: Cardiac echogenic foci are common finding on prenatal follow-up. At hillel Yaffe medical center a post natal echography is performed to all newborns with prenatal cardiac echogenic foci. Reviewing the data collected until now may reduce the need for poist natal echography.

detailed_description.textblock: Cardiac echogenic foci are common finding on prenatal follow-up. At hillel Yaffe medical center a post natal echography is performed to all newborns with prenatal cardiac echogenic foci. The investigator will review all echographies performed in the last ten years. Reviewing the data collected until now may reduce the need for poist natal echography.

primary_outcome.measure: Any sonographic cardiac pathologic finding exists
primary_outcome.description: Any sonographic cardiac pathologic finding exists, as defined by the cardiologist who performs the postnatal echocardiography.

arm_group.description: Newborn infants who had prenatal cardiac echogenic focus

study_pop.textblock: Newborn infants at hillle Yaffe medical center during 10 years: 2010-2019

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Newborns who had a cardiac echogenic focus during prenatal pollow-up.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Newborns who did not had postnatal echocardiography due to technical reasons.

reference.citation: Shakoor S, Ismail H, Munim S. Intracardiac echogenic focus and fetal outcome - review of cases from a tertiary care centre in Karachi, Pakistan. J Matern Fetal Neonatal Med. 2013 Jan;26(1):2-4. doi: 10.3109/14767058.2012.703724. Epub 2012 Jul 13.
